LanguageData.BenLubarsAndroidTiersPatches_patch_space: Fixes a bug that causes android flesh to not function as a space suit.
LanguageData.BenLubarsAndroidTiersPatches_patch_chron: Makes androids immune to human chronic diseases (this is relevant if another mod tries to give them one directly).
LanguageData.BenLubarsAndroidTiersPatches_patch_basic: No change: Disables this patch\nNever: Prevents actions like the conversion ritual from targeting androids too basic to have an ideoligion.\nFaction: Instead of having no ideoligion, basic androids have their faction's ideoligion.
LanguageData.BenLubarsAndroidTiersPatches_patch_noJoy: Removes the recreation meter from basic androids that don't gain any benefit from recreation and don't seek out recreation.
LanguageData.BenLubarsAndroidTiersPatches_AbilityCant: {0_labelShort} is too basic to understand ideoligions.
